portfolio.title: Opinion Spam Detection Using Ensemble Learning
portfolio.description: Developed an ensemble learning solution to detect fraudulent online reviews by leveraging advanced NLP techniques and multiple machine learning classifiers, achieving a notable improvement in accuracy.

portfolio.title: Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback
portfolio.description: Built a custom RLHF pipeline integrating supervised fine-tuning and Proximal Policy Optimization to align AI-generated responses with human preferences, resulting in improved reward scores.

portfolio.title: Conway's Game of Life with TDD
portfolio.description: Implemented Conway's Game of Life using Test Driven Development principles, showcasing robust code quality and a clear demonstration of iterative design through comprehensive testing.

portfolio.title: Wild Rydes
portfolio.description: Developed a serverless ride request web application using AWS services, including Lambda and API Gateway, to deliver a scalable, secure, and interactive user experience.
